properties.entry: The LDAP server hostname is required.
The LDAP server port is required.
The use SSL value is required.
The bind DN is required.
The bind password is required.
The base DN is required.
The user base DN is required.
The group base DN is required.
The user object class is required.
The username attribute is required.
The password expiry attribute is required.
The password attempts attribute is required.
The password history attribute is required.
The title attribute is required.
The first names attribute is required.
The last name attribute is required.
The phone number attribute is required.
The fax number attribute is required.
The mobile number attribute is required.
The e-mail attribute is required.
The description attribute is required.
The group object class is required.
The group attribute is required.
The group member attribute is required.
The maximum password attempts is required.
The password expiry in months is required.
The support password history value is required.
The password history in months is required.
The maximum password history length is required.
The maximum number of filtered users is required.
The maximum number of filtered groups is required.
